abstract.p: Editors' Note on review of Betty Friedan's book, Life So Far, in June 25 Book Review; review cited author's assertion that her former husband, Carl Friedan, beat her, but failed to note that he has denied that claim

block.p: A review of ''Life So Far,'' by Betty Friedan, on Page 10 of The Times Book Review today cites the author's assertion that ''throughout her years of activism'' she ''allowed her husband to get away with beating her.''
The review should have taken note of Carl Friedan's response, in a letter in The Times on May 18 and in an editors' note in this space on May 26, that the accusation is ''blatantly untrue.''
